d.body:
Version: `1.5.2`
Git ref: `refs/tags/1.5.2`
Build Date: `2026-02-27T19:50`
PIP Package: `chroma-1.5.2.tar.gz`
Github Container Registry Image: `:1.5.2`
DockerHub Image: `:1.5.2`

## What's Changed
* [CHORE] Remove unwraps in index by @HammadB in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6382
* [CHORE] Add tracing spans to RLS to debug hangs by @rescrv in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6384
* [DOC] Where Filter reference by @kylediaz in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6386
* [CHORE] Add spans for writing to blockfiles by @HammadB in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6388
* [DOC] Better Python reference by @kylediaz in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6390
* [DOC] better TS reference by @kylediaz in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6391
* Remove beta label from Advanced Search API by @jeffchuber in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6396
* [PERF] Use cluster average as center by @Sicheng-Pan in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6389
* [ENH] Set reasonable defaults for dispatcher config values by @jasonvigil in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6207
* [ENH]: delete_collection for mcmr by @tanujnay112 in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6342
* [ENH]: Tracing for rust sysdb by @tanujnay112 in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6333
* [CHORE] rm old docs by @kylediaz in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6398
* [DOC] Metadata arrays docs by @itaismith in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6383
* [BUG]  Don't drop errors on the floor and silently return. by @rescrv in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6378
* [ENH]: Wire up MCMR with prop tests by @tanujnay112 in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6319
* [DOC] fix getting started code group by @kylediaz in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6408
* [CHORE]  Make rust-sysdb-migration a dep of log-service in mcmr world. by @rescrv in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6407
* [CHORE]  Add a CPU limit to values*.dev.yaml by @rescrv in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6411
* [CHORE] Remove chroma-load from k8s to save resources by @rescrv in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6410
* [CHORE] Fix a test that hogs memory. by @rescrv in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6427
* Revert "[CHORE] Add tracing spans to RLS to debug hangs" by @rescrv in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6393
* [DOC] Regenerate Python Reference by @kylediaz in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6428
* Revert "[ENH] Set reasonable defaults for dispatcher config values" by @jasonvigil in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6430
* [ENH] reject fork_collection for multi-region databases by @rescrv in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6400
* [ENH]: Cache rust git submodules in mounted volume by @tanujnay112 in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6424
* [CHORE](k8s) increase dev CPU limits from 100m to 200-300m by @rescrv in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6435
* [ENH] replace live cloud tests with k8s integration tests by @rescrv in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6434
* [ENH] Make dirty_log_collections metric mcmr-aware. by @rescrv in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6353
* [ENH] Quantized Spann Segment Writer by @Sicheng-Pan in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6397
* [ENH] Wire up quantized writer in compaction by @Sicheng-Pan in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6399
* [ENH] Quantized Spann Segment Reader by @Sicheng-Pan in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6405
* [ENH] Wire up quantized reader in new orchestrator by @Sicheng-Pan in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6409
* [ENH] Garbage collect usearch index files by @Sicheng-Pan in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6416
* [ENH] Trace quantized spann implementation by @Sicheng-Pan in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6425
* [ENH]: Precompute data chunk len() by @tanujnay112 in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6442
* [BUG]: Compaction version file flush was incomplete on MCMR by @tanujnay112 in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6423
* [DOC]: Fixed broken links in Readme by @nilpotent7 in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6440
* [DOC] Fix link to Rust documentation by @anderk222 in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6443
* [ENH]: Allow users to disable FTS in schema by @sanketkedia in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6214
* [BUG] do not call try_join_all with zero futures by @rescrv in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6377
* [CHORE](log-service): populate manifest cache on pull_logs cache miss by @rescrv in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6385
* [ENH](wal3): move compaction cursor into manifest as intrinsic cursor by @rescrv in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6404
* [ENH] Truncate repr of test record set types for readable hypothesis output by @rescrv in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6454
* [ENH]: Code impl for Block with more efficient estimated_size() function by @tanujnay112 in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6448
* [BUG]: Guarantee NAC dedup map cleanup with a drop guard by @tanujnay112 in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6433
* [CHORE]  Set $SERVICE in chroma2 to depend on $SERVICE of chroma. by @rescrv in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6453
* [CHORE] Re-enable mcmr everywhere in test by @rescrv in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6452
* [ENH] Configuration for fetch_log semaphore by @rescrv in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6367
* [ENH](log-service): add separate concurrency limit for manifest loads by @rescrv in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6364
* [RELEASE] CLI 1.4.1 Python 1.5.1 JS 3.3.1 by @itaismith in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6459
* [ENH] Balanced split by @Sicheng-Pan in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6461
* [DOC] change OpenAI EF args by @kylediaz in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6462
* [ENH] Expose rawjson from schema in js client by @gshahbazian in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6460
* [ENH]  Only enrich dirty logs from s3, not repl. by @rescrv in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6463
* Revert "[ENH] Expose rawjson from schema in js client" by @gshahbazian in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6464
* [DOC] Fix typo in JS client README by @veeceey in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6360
* [DOC] fix TS run chroma command by @kylediaz in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6406
* [BUG] Disable recursive balance in quantized spann by @Sicheng-Pan in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6468
* [ENH] Recursion depth control in quantized spann by @Sicheng-Pan in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6471
* [ENH](wal3): add ignore_dirty column to manifests table by @rescrv in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6472
* [ENH] Add close() method and context manager support to Client by @veeceey in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6373
* [RELEASE] Rust 0.13.1 by @Sicheng-Pan in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6477
* [ENH]: Allow rebuild to specify segments by @tanujnay112 in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6478
* [CHORE]: Make S3 read error more descriptive by @tanujnay112 in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6481
* [ENH](log-service): separate S3 and repl dirty log roll-ups by @rescrv in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6465
* [DOC] Add back introduction section by @kylediaz in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6482
* [DOC] Clean up Gemini docs by @markmcd in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6450
* [BUG] Balance at depth boundary by @Sicheng-Pan in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6484
* [DOC] update OpenAI embeddings guide link in README by @shubham4576 in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6381
* [DOC] Google ADK integration page by @itaismith in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6490
* [DOC] fix  in metadata filtering example by @kylediaz in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6494
* [CHORE][wal3] cut some recently added traces that exceed volume. by @rescrv in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6492
* [ENH] Move the filter by number of compactors to pre-enrichment. by @rescrv in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6487
* [ENH] Dim some colors in dark mode by @gshahbazian in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6498
* [TST] Don't run tests on markdown change by @kylediaz in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6488
* [CHORE]  Add debug logging so we can see what the RLS sees when it throws backpressure warnings by @rescrv in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6506
* Revert "[ENH] add tracing instrumentation to pull_logs (#6376)" by @rescrv in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6505
* [CHORE]  Set the tilt-up timeout for `tilt ci` to 10min. by @rescrv in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6508
* [ENH] Pplx EF by @itaismith in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6511
* [ENH](scheduler): batch sysdb queries in collection enrichment by @rescrv in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6496
* [RELEASE] Python 1.5.2 by @itaismith in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6513

## New Contributors
* @nilpotent7 made their first contribution in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6440
* @anderk222 made their first contribution in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6443
* @veeceey made their first contribution in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6360
* @markmcd made their first contribution in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6450
* @shubham4576 made their first contribution in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6381

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/compare/1.5.0...1.5.2

Version: `1.5.0`
Git ref: `refs/tags/1.5.0`
Build Date: `2026-02-09T08:47`
PIP Package: `chroma-1.5.0.tar.gz`
Github Container Registry Image: `:1.5.0`
DockerHub Image: `:1.5.0`

## What's Changed
* [ENH]: Create collection impl in rust sysdb by @sanketkedia in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6131
* [ENH] Export search options parameter by @gshahbazian in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6160
* [CHORE]  Wire up `s3_*` metrics for object storage by @rescrv in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6157
* [ENH] Configs over topologies by @rescrv in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6134
* [CHORE]  multi-region-config ^ classical config by @rescrv in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6138
* [ENH][mcmr] add database_name to log service protocol by @rescrv in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6118
* [ENH]: Get collections impl by @sanketkedia in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6146
* [ENH]: Get Collection with segments impl by @sanketkedia in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6147
* [ENH][wal3] add type-erased LogWriterTrait and LogReaderTrait traits by @rescrv in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6121
* [ENH][wal3] add reader/cursors methods to LogWriterTrait by @rescrv in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6122
* [RELEASE] JS 3.2.2 by @itaismith in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6164
* [ENH]: Update collection by @sanketkedia in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6163
* [BUG]  Trickled collections become meta-stably eligible for compaction. by @rescrv in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6170
* [ENH]: Consume mcmr config in rust sysdb by @sanketkedia in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6169
* [CLN] Remove unused query-service config by @jasonvigil in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6166
* [ENH]: Route to rust sysdb based on topo prefix for create and get collection by @sanketkedia in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6172
* [ENH]: Plumb database name into update collection by @sanketkedia in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6174
* [CLN] Cleanup unused query-service config fields by @jasonvigil in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6176
* [TST][rust-log-service]: add database_name parameter to log service test helpers by @rescrv in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6126
* [CLN] Remove bm25 tenant override from query config by @Sicheng-Pan in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6177
* [ENH][topology]: add per-topology config and type transformation methods by @rescrv in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6165
* [DOC] Improve llms.txt generation by @itaismith in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6175
* [DOC] IA improvements and getting-started update by @itaismith in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6182
* [DOC] Getting started prompt instructions by @itaismith in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6183
* [ENH] Improve/fix ssr rendering of docs pages by @gshahbazian in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6189
* [ENH] HNSW load_from_hnsw_data spawn_blocking by @HammadB in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6191
* [ENH]: DB name plumbed in Get collection with segments by @sanketkedia in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6179
* [CHORE]: Add tokio runtime metrics by @tanujnay112 in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6190
* [DOC] Document top-level query service configuration fields by @jasonvigil in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6173
* [PERF] Preallocate s3 reads based on content-length by @HammadB in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6195
* [CLN] Enter span in #6191 by @HammadB in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6196
* [ENH] Write to disk on eviction instead of insertion by @HammadB in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/5974
* [CHORE] Trace within filter, limit, select by @Sicheng-Pan in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6186
* [CLN] Don't log MD key by @HammadB in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6200
* [CLN] Rename dispatcher `IncrementOnDrop` type for correctness by @jasonvigil in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6203
* [PERF] Reduce copy in storage layer by @HammadB in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6197
* [PERF] Prefetch to disk by @HammadB in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6198
* [ENH] chroma-storage: add S3Storage runtime options and head_object support by @philipithomas in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6205
* [ENH] Update schema and search docs to use CloudClient by @tjkrusinskichroma in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6211
* [CLN] chroma-storage: fix PR review issues for S3Storage by @philipithomas in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6208
* [ENH]  Wire up the rust-log-service with MCMR config. by @rescrv in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6171
* [CHORE]  Remove google cloud dep from config crate. by @rescrv in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6221
* [BUG]  re-add topology-aware name validation by @rescrv in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6217
* [CHORE]  Wire up auth for spanner in log-service. by @rescrv in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6228
* [ENH][log-service]: return topology name in compaction info by @rescrv in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6227
* [ENH][wal3]: try preferred storage first in FragmentReader by @rescrv in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6232
* [ENH][spanner-migrations]: add DML support and default tenant migrations by @rescrv in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6215
* [PERF] Skip sparse vector in log filter reader by @Sicheng-Pan in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6231
* [PERF] Execute rate limited get in same future by @Sicheng-Pan in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6234
* [ENH] Multi-bit RabitQ by @Sicheng-Pan in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6219
* [ENH] add Spanner migration checksum validation to PR workflow by @rescrv in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6233
* [CHORE] Add default annotation to replicated fragment options. by @rescrv in https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/pull/6224
